Class TestOperator: tests for Operator linear operator class. So summary: a suite of unit tests verifying functionality of linear operator class, covering arithmetic, composition, dimensions, permutations, circuit conversion, initialization, etc.

Business intent: ensure reliability and correctness of quantum operator implementation for quantum computing library.

Keywords: unit testing, linear operator, quantum operator, addition, composition, adjoint, permutation, circuit conversion, dimensions, tensor, matrix, transpose, power, reshape, unitary, multiply, copy, equality, expand, data, input/output dimensions, Qargs, etc.
